posts.author: Fleetfoot
posts.body:
Hey there everyone!

Welcome to the thread for general questions for Staff Members, silly questions gets silly answers while serious questions will be provided with serious answers.

Please have in mind this thread is more for good fun and curiosities, we will still provide assistance however it is advised and requested that you make your own thread at "Site & Policy":/forums/meta for the more serious questions and discussions regarding the site and it's policies.

Please feel free to ask away!

Cheers~

posts.author: other Pony
posts.body: I love your avatar, have a source?

posts.author: other Pony
posts.body: Second question, will derpibooru content be able to be uploaded here as well?

posts.author: LightningBolt
posts.body:
"@other Pony":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=42#post_42
"https://derpibooru.org/images/1965688":https://derpibooru.org/images/1965688

posts.author: other Pony
posts.body: Thank you

posts.author: other Pony
posts.body:
Third and final question (for now)

Is it true that you have control 90% of alcohol imports around the world?

posts.author: Luna
posts.body:
"@other Pony":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=46#post_46
Derpi content will not be merged here. But people are free to upload it if they so wish.

"@other Pony":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=55#post_55
Shit I have been exposed

posts.author: other Pony
posts.body:
Now the for the fourth (unluckest) and ultimate question:

ARE bronies furries?

posts.author: Luna
posts.body:
"@other Pony":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=73#post_73
Yes, they are just very particular about what species they like

posts.author: other Pony
posts.body: In your opinion, do Lizards/dragons/etc. (Scalies) count as furry material?

posts.author: Luna
posts.body:
"@other Pony":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=127#post_127
yeah

posts.author: LightningBolt
posts.body:
"@other Pony":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=127#post_127
Imo, anything organic that isn't human is furry to me.

Lizards, furry, Fish, furry, Aliens, furry, Eldritch abominations, furry!

posts.author: Sky Spark
posts.body: What are the best furries and why are they wolves?

posts.author: Luna
posts.body:
"@Mikey":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=177#post_177
foxes, dragons and griffons :V

posts.author: Sky Spark
posts.body:
"@Luna":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=178#post_178
-Yes I know I have generic furry taste-

posts.author: Nicelucario
posts.body:
"@other Pony":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=127#post_127
They're animals given human traits, so yes.

posts.author: CruFox
posts.body:
How to make a link that ends with a bracket but without a space between the link and the bracket? For example if I write:

[bq][==("https://www.google.com/":https://www.google.com/)==][/bq]

 then what I get is ("https://www.google.com/":https://www.google.com/), the last "@)@" is treated as part of the link. How to make it not part of it?

posts.author: Luna
posts.body:
"@CruFox":/forums/dis/topics/ask-the-mods-anything?post_id=687#post_687
we'll switch to markdown soon

posts.author: CruFox
posts.body:
Does this type of art count as furry? 
!https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EYFjcVqXsAMElfI?format=jpg&name=small!
(source: "https://twitter.com/goobysart/status/1261398715492941825":https://twitter.com/goobysart/status/1261398715492941825 )

!https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EXl05JJX0AAEkw4?format=jpg&name=small!
(source: "https://twitter.com/BlepFox/status/1259166144403066880":https://twitter.com/BlepFox/status/1259166144403066880 )

Those animals were given more expressive eyes (or sometimes also other face features) so this is kind of anthropomorphisation of their irl versions. People who draw those are clearly furries, just check their other art or profile pictures ;) Could this type of content be uploaded here?
